column3: Amounts may not add due to rounding.

Exclusive of amortization of intangible assets, except as disclosed in Note 1K. Basis of Presentation and Significant Accounting Policies: Amortization of Intangible Assets, Depreciation and Certain Long-Lived Assets.
Income from continuing operations before provision for taxes on income.
Includes the Animal Health (Zoetis) business through June 24, 2013, the date of disposal, and the Nutrition business through November 30, 2012, the date of disposal.
Includes post-close adjustments for the periods subsequent to disposal.
